record.title: ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 30, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 30, 2008 -- (Senate - January 29, 2008)

[Page: S457]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m. tomorrow, Wednesday, January 30; that after the prayer and the pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and that there then be a period for the transaction of morning business with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
